data: {"concept_id": "noun", "concept_name": "Noun", "set": "Grammar & Punctuation", "type": "element", "definition": "Naming unit that anchors reality and controls reference, texture, and pacing.", "axes": "category|specificity|concreteness|definiteness|number|modifier_load|role", "axis_values": "common|proper|concrete|abstract|count|mass|collective | generic|specific|hyper_specific | abstract|concrete | a_an|the|zero | singular|plural | low|medium|high | anchor|motif|euphemism|nominalization", "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}

{"concept_id": "noun", "error_id": "nominalization_bloat", "description": "Verbs taxidermied into nouns drain life (‘make a decision’ vs ‘decide’).", "fixit": "Restore verbs unless tone requires formality.", "example_fix": "Cut corpse nouns; revive verbs.", "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}

{"concept_id": "noun", "error_id": "vague_nouns", "description": "Stuff/thing/something blur the scene.", "fixit": "Choose specific hyponyms.", "example_fix": "Zoom ladder to concrete handle.", "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}

{"concept_id": "noun", "error_id": "euphemism_smuggle", "description": "Soft nouns hide truth/bias (‘collateral damage’).", "fixit": "Use precise terms; if euphemism, flag purpose.", "example_fix": "Swap to cost-bearing nouns.", "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}

{"concept_id": "noun", "error_id": "stack_overload", "description": "Overloaded noun stacks stall rhythm.", "fixit": "Split, sequence, or delete modifiers.", "example_fix": "Keep one heavy noun per line.", "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}

{"concept_id": "noun", "error_id": "article_misfire", "description": "Article choice breaks meaning/vibe.", "fixit": "Adjust a/the/Ø to signal newness/sharedness/universal.", "example_fix": "Test each variant aloud.", "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_noun_upgrade", "concept_id": "noun", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Replace vague/abstract nouns with precise handles; justify with one sensory cue.", "expected_features": "Sharper image; pacing tuned via modifier load.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "category|specificity|concreteness|definiteness|number|modifier_load|role", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_braid_abscncr", "concept_id": "noun", "cognitive_goal": "design", "task_type": "compose", "prompt_template": "Write an Abstract/Concrete Braid: pair one abstract noun with its concrete representative.", "expected_features": "Pair feels earned; meaning deepens.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "category|specificity|concreteness|definiteness|number|modifier_load|role", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_zoom_ladder", "concept_id": "noun", "cognitive_goal": "design", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Run a Zoom Ladder: category → type → instance (3 steps).", "expected_features": "Ends on a culturally precise proper/common noun.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "category|specificity|concreteness|definiteness|number|modifier_load|role", "difficulty": 1, "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_apposition", "concept_id": "noun", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Compress a character line using apposition (Name, renaming NP, …).", "expected_features": "Info density rises without confusion.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "category|specificity|concreteness|definiteness|number|modifier_load|role", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Noun.md", "source_md5": "6eee8340edb47397b8da86413a9bffbc", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:25:21.917444Z"}
